description: Enjoying something so much that one doesn't feel tired; being so absorbed that one forgets fatigue.

examples.chinese: 滑雪真的太上瘾啦,从早滑到晚,乐此不疲
examples.translation: Skiing is really addictive, skiing from morning till night, never getting tired

examples.chinese: 每天老婆做饭,虽然辛苦,但他乐此不疲,毫无怨言
examples.translation: Every day his wife cooks, although it's hard work, he enjoys it tirelessly and never complains

examples.chinese: 为什么有人觉得坚持锻炼很难,而有人却乐此不疲
examples.translation: Why do some people find it hard to persist in exercising, while others enjoy it tirelessly?
